statements: SELECT * FROM service_providers;
SELECT name, location FROM service_providers;
SELECT id, name FROM service_providers WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name FROM service_providers WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM service_providers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_providers WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, location FROM service_providers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM service_providers WHERE id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000','223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000') ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS provider_count, location FROM service_providers GROUP BY location HAVING provider_count > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM service_providers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_location FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location, customer_id FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM service_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM service_providers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_location = POINT(1,1);
SELECT customer_name, provider_name FROM customers JOIN service_providers ON customers.customer_location = service_providers.provider_location;
SELECT * FROM service_providers WHERE provider_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT provider_id) FROM service_providers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM service_providers;
SELECT * FROM distance_matrix WHERE customer_id = 1 AND provider_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT service_type FROM service_providers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM service_providers WHERE service_type = 'Plumbing' ORDER BY provider_name;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.provider_name, d.distance FROM customers c JOIN distance_matrix d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN service_providers p ON d.provider_id = p.provider_id ORDER BY d.distance DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_location FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name FROM service_providers WHERE provider_id > 3;
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM services ORDER BY service_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_availability WHERE available = TRUE AND availability_id < 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, ST_X(provider_location), ST_Y(provider_location) FROM service_providers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT service_name, provider_name FROM services JOIN service_providers ON services.service_provider_id = service_providers.provider_id;
SELECT service_name, available FROM services JOIN service_availability ON services.service_id = service_availability.service_id WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, ST_AsText(customer_location) FROM customers WHERE ST_Distance(customer_location, 'POINT(10 20)') < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT provider_name, service_name FROM service_providers INNER JOIN provider_services ON service_providers.provider_id = provider_services.provider_id INNER JOIN services ON provider_services.service_id = services.service_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM service_requests WHERE service_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM service_requests;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM service_providers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT service_name FROM services WHERE service_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT * FROM provider_services JOIN service_providers ON provider_services.provider_id = service_providers.provider_id;
SELECT customer_name, service_name FROM customers JOIN service_requests ON customers.customer_id = service_requests.customer_id WHERE service_requests.service_id = 2;
